info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 02 at 2:03AM CDT until May 02 at 3:15AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN PARKER...SOUTHEASTERN PALO PINTO AND NORTHWESTERN HOOD COUNTIES... At 203 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lipan, or 15 miles south of Mineral Wells, moving east at 20 mph. This storm is over Interstate 20 near Highway 281. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Weatherford, Granbury, Lipan and Oak Trail Shores. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
